# GitHub Workflows

GitHub Actions CI/CD workflows for automated testing and deployment.

## Contents

| File | Description |
|------|-------------|
| (future) | CI/CD pipelines will be added here |

## Purpose

This directory contains GitHub Actions workflow definitions for:
- Continuous Integration (running tests on PRs)
- Continuous Deployment (deploying releases)
- Automated code quality checks
